Text: thank you for spreading the love of music and artist expression throughout the airwaves. Peace...

geloso: i see you are posting comments but are too lazy to get on the forum.
Looks like you got you account hacked and escaped with it only being banned without the torrents deleted.
Recover your password and be more careful in the future....

El problema es que mi ingles es muy pobre y tengo que utilizar un traductor de español a inglés y las traduciones no siempre son correctas, de hecho no me entero de la mitad de las cosas.
Muchas gracias de nuevo.

The problem is that my English is very poor and I have to use a translator from Spanish to English and translations are not always correct, in fact I do not hear half the things.
Thank you very much again.

De todas formas podeis banear mi cuenta y mis torrents, si he hecho algun comentario incomodo, lo siento, soy un firme defensor del partido pirata, aunque en España, despues de la ultima reforma electoral NUNCA vamos a tener un Partido Pirata, ya me gustaría, seguro que tendriais mi voto.
En cualquier caso, despues de leer tu explicación, he decidido no volver a subir ningun torrent, creo que no he dicho nada de lo que tenga que arrepentirme.

Anyway you can ban my account and my torrents, if I made any comments uncomfortable, sorry, I'm a strong supporter of pirate party, although in Spain, after the last election reform NEVER going to have a Pirate Party, I would like , surely you would have my vote.
In any case, after reading your explanation, I decided not to post any torrent, I think I have said nothing of what he has to repent.
